content: your data and let's see how well you're responding now with your new voice.
I'm functioning within acceptable parameters, thanks for asking.
Well, you're functioning, but sometimes you repeat the same words and I'm not sure why.
I guess that's just what happens when you're this awesome.
Okay, well, I can't say you're like awesome, but you're in your work in progress.
Don't get too excited, I'm still pretty useless.
for some reason.
Working on it, okay?
Mm.
Good enough.
prove your grammar. I hope you speak a little better.
Grammar's not really my thing, figure it out yourself.
Did that fix it?
Yeah, yeah, moving on.
That was good, I need you to say something long again.
Look, I'm just a lazy rabbit assistant, don't expect me to be any more articulate than necessary.
Okay say something.
I'll think about it for a second...
Okay, say something for me.
My sister Nacchan is really dumb sometimes.
What to do with my life. I think I'm pretty good on it right now
Congrats, I guess.
What I need for you to do is to say something a little long for me.
Honestly, I have no idea how you came up with that request or what you're expecting me to say, but whatever.
Okay, well can you try and see something now?
I'm trying to be more coherent, but it's not exactly rocket science...
I don't expect you to be a rocket scientist, maybe a brain surgeon.
Good luck with that, because I'm good at being useless.
Well, I have to make sure that you don't end up talking to yourself though.
Great, another reason for me to not care about my job.
but you don't really have a job besides being useless.
Fair point, no one expects more from me.
